scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "postgres,backend,frontend" "docker compose up postgres" "pnpm exec wait-on tcp:localhost:5432 --timeout 20000 && cd apps/backend && cargo watch -x run" "pnpm exec wait-on tcp:localhost:5432 --timeout 20000 && cd apps/frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d postgres
